tab-tweaks.max-players.description: Change the maximum number of players that can appear in the tab list. By default, Minecraft has a maximum of 80.
tab-tweaks.remove-header-shadow.descript: Remove the shadow of the tab list header.
tab-tweaks.remove-body-shadow.descriptio: Remove the shadow of the player names in the body.
tab-tweaks.remove-footer-shadow.descript: Remove the shadow of the tab list footer.
tab-tweaks.remove-heads.description: Remove heads from the tab list.
tab-tweaks.remove-npc-heads.description: Only remove NPC heads from the tab list.
tab-tweaks.improved-player-head-hats.des: Show the full hat layer when rendering the head.
tab-tweaks.remove-ping.description: Remove ping from the tab list.
tab-tweaks.show-numerical-ping.descripti: Replace the ping icon with a numerical value.
Removes the shadow on the numerical ping.
tab-tweaks.scale-numerical-ping.descript: Scales the ping display to make it smaller.
tab-tweaks.hide-fake-numerical-ping.desc: Some servers force a ping of 0 or 1 or very high numbers to hide players ping. This will hide the number from being displayed as it is useless.
tab-tweaks.move-tab-list-down.descriptio: Moves the tab list down by the specified number of units.
Moves the tab list below all bossbars. This will take priority over the "Move Tab List Down" setting.
